channel.title: Lifestyle on Portfolio Website for Mehek

item.title: Estimating Donald Trump's (weekly) net approval rate
item.description: Do people really approve of Donald Trump? This was a project that we created during our course in Applied Statistics to understand Donald Trump’s approval margins among voters from 2017 - 2020. knitr::opts_chunk$set( message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, tidy=FALSE, # display code as typed size="small") # slightly smaller font for code options(digits = 3) # default figure size knitr::opts_chunk$set( fig.width=11, fig.height=7, fig.align = "center" ) To start with out analysis we load the approval pollist data available on fivethirtyeight.

item.title: Estimating Donald Trump's (weekly) net approval rate from 2017 - 2020

item.title: Hillary vs. Trump

item.title: Top 25 consumers of wine in the world
item.description: Countries that love to get drunk on wine! This was a project that we created during our course in Applied Statistics to visualise the top 25 wine consuming countries in the world. knitr::opts_chunk$set( message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, tidy=FALSE, # display code as typed size="small") # slightly smaller font for code options(digits = 3) # default figure size knitr::opts_chunk$set( fig.width=12, fig.height=6.75, fig.align = "center" ) We start off by loading our data frame and then checking which values were missing.

item.title: Variation in IMDB ratings (Steven Speilberg vs. Tim Burton)
item.description: How do the average IMDB ratings of Steven Spielberg and Tim Burton vary? We created this analysis to understand if there was any significant variation in the mean ratings of two of the greatest directors of all time, Steven Spielberg and Tim Burton Lets look at the average ratings for Steven Spielberg and Tim Burton and analyse whether they are significantly different from each other. knitr::opts_chunk$set( message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, tidy=FALSE, # display code as typed size="small") # slightly smaller font for code options(digits = 3) # default figure size knitr::opts_chunk$set( fig.

item.title: Ipsum
item.description: Nullam et orci eu lorem consequat tincidunt vivamus et sagittis magna sed nunc rhoncus condimentum sem. In efficitur ligula tate urna. Maecenas massa sed magna lacinia magna pellentesque lorem ipsum dolor. Nullam et orci eu lorem consequat tincidunt. Vivamus et sagittis tempus.
